lead_paragraph: Heeding a threat of withdrawal by Donald J. Trump, the secretary general wants at least 55 countries to commit to the pact for at least the next four years.

headline.print_headline: With U.S. Election in Sight, U.N. Leader Seeks Quick Action on Climate Accord
headline.main: With U.S. Election in Sight, Ban Ki-moon Seeks Quick Action on Climate Accord

snippet: Heeding a threat of withdrawal by Donald J. Trump, the secretary general wants at least 55 countries to commit to the pact for at least the next four years....
abstract: United Nations Sec Gen Ban Ki-moon seeks to ratify 2015 Paris climate change accord before 2016 presidential election in bid to prevent American withdrawal; Donald Trump has vowed to withdraw United States from agreement if elected.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change
